resources.string: Kune Food folds barely a year after getting sh100m funding

Kune Food, a kenyan based cloud kitchen, has shut down operations barely a year after its launch, the companys founder and chief executive officer Robin Reetch announced yesterday. The startup which was founded in 2020 laid off 90 employees. In a statement posted on his LinkedIn page, Mr Reetch cited a stifled economy and inflated food prices as circumstances that contributed to Kunes closure.
